trans-unit.source: Defines interfaces used by internal .NET structures to initialize application configuration properties.
Creates and returns a context object for a <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement"></xref> of an application configuration.
A string representing the path of the application configuration file.
A string representing a subpath location of the configuration element.
A context object for a <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement"></xref> object of an application configuration.
Creates and returns a deprecated context object of the application configuration.
A string representing a path to an application configuration file.
A deprecated context object of the application configuration.
Decrypts an encrypted configuration section and returns it as a string.
An encrypted XML string representing a configuration section.
The <xref href="System.Configuration.ProtectedConfigurationProvider"></xref> object.
The <xref href="System.Configuration.ProtectedConfigurationSection"></xref> object.
A decrypted configuration section as a string.
Deletes the <xref:System.IO.Stream> object performing I/O tasks on the application configuration file.
A string representing the name of the <xref:System.IO.Stream> object performing I/O tasks on the configuration file.
Encrypts a configuration section and returns it as a string.
An XML string representing a configuration section to encrypt.
The <xref href="System.Configuration.ProtectedConfigurationProvider"></xref> object.
The <xref href="System.Configuration.ProtectedConfigurationSection"></xref> object.
An encrypted configuration section represented as a string.
Returns the complete path to an application configuration file based on the location subpath.
A string representing the path of the application configuration file.
The subpath location of the configuration file.
A string representing the complete path to an application configuration file.
Returns a <xref:System.Type> object representing the type of the configuration object.
The type name
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to throw an exception if an error occurs; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>
A <xref:System.Type> object representing the type of the configuration object.
Returns a string representing a type name from the <xref:System.Type> object representing the type of the configuration.
A <xref:System.Type> object.
A string representing the type name from a <xref:System.Type> object representing the type of the configuration.
Associates the configuration with a <xref href="System.Security.PermissionSet"></xref> object.
An <xref href="System.Configuration.Internal.IInternalConfigRecord"></xref> object.
The <xref href="System.Security.PermissionSet"></xref> object to associate with the configuration.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to indicate the configuration host is has completed building associated permissions; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Returns a string representing the configuration file name associated with the <xref:System.IO.Stream> object performing I/O tasks on the configuration file.
A string representing the path of the application configuration file.
A string representing the configuration file name associated with the <xref:System.IO.Stream> I/O tasks on the configuration file.
Returns a string representing the configuration file name associated with the <xref:System.IO.Stream> object performing I/O tasks on a remote configuration file.
A string representing the configuration file name associated with the <xref:System.IO.Stream> object performing I/O tasks on the configuration file.
A string representing a path to a remote configuration file.
A string representing the configuration file name associated with the <xref:System.IO.Stream> object performing I/O tasks on the configuration file.
Returns the version of the <xref:System.IO.Stream> object associated with configuration file.
A string representing the name of the <xref:System.IO.Stream> object performing I/O tasks on the configuration file.
The version of the <xref:System.IO.Stream> object associated with configuration file.
Instructs the host to impersonate and returns an <xref:System.IDisposable> object required by the internal .NET structure.
An <xref:System.IDisposable> value.
Initializes a configuration host.
The configuration root object.
The parameter object containing the values used for initializing the configuration host.
Initializes a configuration object.
The subpath location of the configuration file.
A string representing the path of the application configuration file.
A string representing the location of a configuration path.
The <xref href="System.Configuration.Internal.IInternalConfigRoot"></xref> object.
The parameter object containing the values used for initializing the configuration host.
Returns a value indicating whether the configuration file is located at a higher level in the configuration hierarchy than the application configuration.
A string representing the path of the application configuration file.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> the configuration file is located at a higher level in the configuration hierarchy than the application configuration; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Returns a value indicating whether a child record is required for a child configuration path.
A string representing the path of the application configuration file.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if child record is required for a child configuration path; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Determines if a different <xref:System.Type> definition is allowable for an application configuration object.
A string representing the path of the application configuration file.
A <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationAllowDefinition"></xref> object.
A <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationAllowExeDefinition"></xref> object.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if a different <xref:System.Type> definition is allowable for an application configuration object; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Returns a value indicating whether the file path used by a <xref:System.IO.Stream> object to read a configuration file is a valid path.
A string representing the name of the <xref:System.IO.Stream> object performing I/O tasks on the configuration file.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the path used by a <xref:System.IO.Stream> object to read a configuration file is a valid path; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.

Returns a value indicating whether a configuration section requires a fully trusted code access security level and does not allow the <xref:System.Security.AllowPartiallyTrustedCallersAttribute> attribute to disable implicit link demands.
The <xref href="System.Configuration.Internal.IInternalConfigRecord"></xref> object.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the configuration section requires a fully trusted code access security level and does not allow the <xref:System.Security.AllowPartiallyTrustedCallersAttribute> attribute to disable implicit link demands; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Returns a value indicating whether the initialization of a configuration object is considered delayed.
The <xref href="System.Configuration.Internal.IInternalConfigRecord"></xref> object.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the initialization of a configuration object is considered delayed; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Returns a value indicating whether the configuration object supports a location tag.
A string representing the path of the application configuration file.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the configuration object supports a location tag; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Returns a value indicating whether the configuration is remote.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the configuration is remote; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Returns a value indicating whether a configuration path is to a configuration node whose contents should be treated as a root.
A string representing the path of the application configuration file.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the configuration path is to a configuration node whose contents should be treated as a root; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Returns a value indicating whether the configuration path is trusted.
A string representing the path of the application configuration file.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the configuration path is trusted; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Opens a <xref:System.IO.Stream> to read a configuration file.
A string representing the name of the <xref:System.IO.Stream> object performing I/O tasks on the configuration file.
A <xref:System.IO.Stream> object.
Opens a <xref:System.IO.Stream> object to read a configuration file.
A string representing the name of the <xref:System.IO.Stream> object performing I/O tasks on the configuration file.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to assert permissions; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Returns the object specified by streamName.
Opens a <xref:System.IO.Stream> object for writing to a configuration file or for writing to a temporary file used to build a configuration file.
Allows a <xref:System.IO.Stream> object to be designated as a template for copying file attributes.
A string representing the name of the <xref:System.IO.Stream> object performing I/O tasks on the configuration file.
The name of a <xref:System.IO.Stream> object from which file attributes are to be copied as a template.
The write context of the <xref:System.IO.Stream> object.
A <xref:System.IO.Stream> object.
Opens a <xref:System.IO.Stream> object for writing to a configuration file.
Allows a <xref:System.IO.Stream> object to be designated as a template for copying file attributes.
A string representing the name of the <xref:System.IO.Stream> object performing I/O tasks on the configuration file.
The name of a <xref:System.IO.Stream> from which file attributes are to be copied as a template.
The write context of the <xref:System.IO.Stream> object performing I/O tasks on the configuration file.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to assert permissions; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Returns the object specified by streamName.
Returns a value indicating whether the entire configuration file could be read by a designated <xref:System.IO.Stream> object.
A string representing the path of the application configuration file.
A string representing the name of the <xref:System.IO.Stream> object performing I/O tasks on the configuration file.
if the entire configuration file could be read by the object designated by streamName; otherwise, .
Instructs the <xref href="System.Configuration.Internal.IInternalConfigHost"></xref> object to read a designated section of its associated configuration file.
A string representing the identifying name of a configuration file section group.
A string representing the identifying name of a configuration file section.
if a section of the configuration file designated by sectionGroupName and sectionName could be read by a object; otherwise, .
Indicates a new configuration record requires a complete initialization.
An <xref href="System.Configuration.Internal.IInternalConfigRecord"></xref> object.
Instructs the <xref href="System.Configuration.Internal.IInternalConfigHost"></xref> object to monitor an associated <xref:System.IO.Stream> object for changes in a configuration file.
A string representing the name of the <xref:System.IO.Stream> object performing I/O tasks on the configuration file.
A <xref href="System.Configuration.Internal.StreamChangeCallback"></xref> object to receive the returned data representing the changes in the configuration file.
An <xref:System.Object> containing changed configuration settings.
Instructs the <xref href="System.Configuration.Internal.IInternalConfigHost"></xref> object to stop monitoring an associated <xref:System.IO.Stream> object for changes in a configuration file.
A string representing the name of the <xref:System.IO.Stream> object performing I/O tasks on the configuration file.
A <xref href="System.Configuration.Internal.StreamChangeCallback"></xref> object.
Returns a value indicating whether the host configuration supports change notification.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the configuration supports change notification; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Returns a value indicating whether the host configuration supports location tags.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the configuration supports location tags; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Returns a value indicating whether the host configuration supports path tags.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the configuration supports path tags; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Returns a value indicating whether the host configuration supports configuration refresh.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the configuration supports configuration refresh; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Verifies that a configuration definition is allowed for a configuration record.
A string representing the path of the application configuration file.
A <xref:System.Configuration.SectionInformation.AllowDefinition*> object.
A <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationAllowExeDefinition"></xref> object
An <xref href="System.Configuration.Internal.IConfigErrorInfo"></xref> object.
Indicates that all writing to the configuration file has completed.
A string representing the name of the <xref:System.IO.Stream> object performing I/O tasks on the configuration file.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the write to the configuration file was completed successfully; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
The write context of the <xref:System.IO.Stream> object performing I/O tasks on the configuration file.
Indicates that all writing to the configuration file has completed and specifies whether permissions should be asserted.
A string representing the name of the <xref:System.IO.Stream> object performing I/O tasks on the configuration file.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to indicate the write was completed successfully; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
The write context of the <xref:System.IO.Stream> object performing I/O tasks on the configuration file.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to assert permissions; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
